io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils

Interface StatelessView<State>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBarcodeCameraView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarcodeCameraView

    public StatelessView<State>

    View which does not have its own internal state and therefore should take new state from outside.

    • Method Detail

      • updateState

        void updateState(State newState)

        Updates state of the view.

        Parameters:
        newState - new state of the view.
